# canRun

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the controller’s workflow is able to run.

## Declaration

```swift
var canRun: Bool { get }
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the controller’s workflow is able to run; [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.

## Discussion

You might use this method to determine when to enable a “Run” button or other UI element you use to run the workflow.

## Getting Workflow Information

- **isPaused**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the controller’s workflow is currently paused.
- **isRunning**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the controller’s workflow is currently running.
